title: Measurement of branching fractions for exclusive B decays to charmonium final states
abstract:
We report branching fraction measurements for exclusive decays of charged and neutral B mesons into two-body final states containing a charmonium meson. We use a sample of 
22.72 ± 0.36 million BB events collected between October 1999 and October 2000 with the BABAR detector at the PEP-II storage rings at the Stanford Linear Accelerator Center. The charmonium mesons considered here are J/ψ,ψ(2S), and χ_(cl), and the light meson in the decay is either a K, K^*, or π^0.

Individuals have received support from the Swiss National Science Foundation, the A. P. Sloan Foundation, the Research
